comment: I am not satisfied with the grade I pulled, that's the only reason I'd retake. He is not clear on what he wants paper wise. comment: He is a very nice guy but his class was terrible. All lecture based and never would finish during the class time because he talks a lot. The final was 40 short answer when we were told it would be multiple choice. He grades hard on the writings you have to do.

comment: This was his first semester so I understand why there were some bumps, but he was an extremely difficult professor. We werent prepared for exams, he constantly changed the syllabus and schedule, he assigned a lot of textbook reading, and treated us like children. The final exam was 40 short answer questions, it took me 3 hours to complete 30.

comment: Sweet guy, but is not the best professor. His class is strictly lecture. You do an assignment and wont receive your grade until weeks after. My class took the final and he said it would be multiple choice. It ended being 40 questions of written responses with three answers to each question. Didnt prepare us well enough. I do not recommend.

comment: Dr. Van Welie is a great professor! He is truly passionate about American history but can expect a lot from his students. There is about 15 pages of reading to do between each class which isn't hard but can be tedious. It is also hard to understand what exactly he wants us to study for exams. Long grader, but often gives good feedback.
